screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sbxls file in Sandboxels
screenshot.caption: SBXLS file open in Sandboxels

description: Sandboxels allows you to place various simulated substances, such as sand, rock, snow, limestone, magma, food, and more, and then heat, cool, and otherwise transmogrify those substances. Doing so allows users to view substances' reactions to stimuli and produce exciting visuals.

You can save the current state of a Sandboxels environment by selecting SAVES . From the Save & Load window that appears, you can either save your environment's current state to a Sandboxels slot or download the state as an SBXLS file by selecting Save to File .
